text: The gang's all back in Hotel Transylvania 2. Check out the sneak peek.

So, you're telling
me that I can pick
between all these
different kinds of chips?

Now what's that
beautiful fountain of rubies?
Johnny, have you tried the Slurpee?

It comes in 48 flavors.
We have to try them all.

Uh, I don't know
if we have time.

Why? This place is open
all night. Right, sir?
